desc: Any willful burning or attempt to burn a building, motor vehicle, aircraft, or personal property of another.
name: Arson

desc: An attack by one person upon another for the purpose of inflicting severe injury. This type of assault usually is accompanied by the use of a weapon or by means likely to produce death or injury.
name: Aggravated Assault

desc: The unlawful entry of a structure (both residential and non-residential) with intent to commit a theft.
name: Burglary

desc: The willful (non-negligent) killing of one human being by another.
name: Homicide

desc: The unlawful taking of property from the possession of another; includes pickpocket, pursesnatch, shoplift, and bike theft.
name: Larceny

desc: The carnal knowledge of a female, forcibly and against her will. Attempts are included.
name: Rape

desc: The taking or attempting to take anything of value from a person or persons by force or threat of force.
name: Robbery

desc: The unlawful taking of motor vehicle contents or parts.  Note:  Theft from Auto (Car Prowl) is a Larceny.  It has been separated from the Larceny category to more easily identify where these crimes occur.
name: Theft from Auto

desc: The theft or attempted theft of a motor vehicle; includes motorcycles.
name: Motor Vehicle Theft

desc: Offenses relating to the unlawful possession, sale, use, growing, and manufacturing of illegal drugs.
name: Drugs

desc: Misappropriation or misapplication of money or property entrusted to one's care, custody, or control.
name: Embezzlement

desc: Making, altering, or possessing of a document or negotiable instrument, or signing another's signature, with intent to defraud.  Attempts are included.
name: Forgery

desc: Fraudulent conversion and obtaining money or property by false pretenses. Includes identity theft, confidence games and bad checks, except forgeries and counterfeiting.
name: Fraud

desc: Sex offenses of a commercialized nature, including assisting or promoting prostitution.  Attempts are included.
name: Prostitution

desc: Nonsupport, neglect, desertion, custodial interference, or abuse of family and children. Attempts are included
name: Offenses Against Family

desc: Statutory rape, sodomy, molest, indecent exposure, and other offenses against common decency.  Attempts are included. (Does not include rape or prostitution.)
name: Sex Offenses

desc: Assaults and attempted assaults where no weapons are used and which do not result in serious or aggravated injury to the victim.
name: Simple Assault

desc: Buying, receiving, and possessing stolen property, including attempts.
name: Stolen Property

desc: Willful or malicious destruction, injury, disfigurement, or defacement of any public or private property, real or personal, without consent of the owner or persons having custody or control.  Attempts are included.
name: Vandalism

desc: All violations of regulations or statutes controlling the carrying, using, possessing, furnishing, and manufacturing of deadly weapons or silencers. Attempts are included.
name: Weapons

desc: Offenses relating to violations of curfew or loitering ordinances.
name: Curfew

desc: Breach of the peace.
name: Disorderly Conduct

desc: Driving or operating any vehicle while drunk or under the influence of liquor or drugs.
name: DUII

desc: Promoting, permitting, or engaging in illegal gambling.
name: Gambling

desc: The substantial interference with another person's liberty by force, threat, or deceit, with intent to cause them to be detained against their will.
name: Kidnap

desc: All state and/or local liquor law violations with the exception of driving under the influence. Federal violations are excluded.
name: Liquor Laws

desc: Runaway juveniles when reported by their parents or guardians.
name: Runaway

desc: Includes trespass, blackmail, extortion, bomb threats, stalking, threats/intimidation
name: Trespass
